text: Jujun chike ri kojonelabꞌ ri xaꞌnimaj bꞌik are xchapleꞌtaj kitzukuxik che riꞌ are xkamisax ri Esteban, xebꞌe pa taq ri tinimit rech Fenicia, kꞌo xebꞌe Chipre, kꞌo xebꞌe Antioquía rech Siria.11:19 Antioquía ubꞌiꞌ ri nimalaj tinimit ri kꞌo pa Siria. Kꞌo xuqujeꞌ jun Antioquía chik pa ri tinimit Pisidia. Xkitzijoj ri utzij ri Dios xwi chike ri winaq aꞌj Israel.
